entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:38 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy later this evening and ending this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
